name: shitty robot
description:
You're a robot in an office. You've been tasked with bringing back a floppy disk! Why did they send you? You are the worst choice for this quest. But you're a loyal robot and you'll try your best not to smash up the entire office in the process.

Spoiler: You will smash up the entire office in the process.

Made for Ludum Dare 32.

Sidenote: The game is beatable, I've done it, and I suck at beating video games
